Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Hwacha
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A primitive type of artillery designed to fire multiple rocket-powered iron-tipped arrows at once. The Hwacha consists of a wooden frame with a series of iron tubes mounted on top, which can hold up to 200 arrows. When fired, the Hwacha creates a very inaccurate barrage of projectiles that can inflict significant damage to enemy fortifications and troops.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1

<color=#bb8f04>Human-powered:</color> Driver will get 50% more tired and hungry while driving this vehicle.
